title: Myre Blamish Snail

This type of snail drops two items upon its death; a Blamish myre shell and a Thin snail. Their respawn time is around 30–40 seconds. A chisel can be used on the dropped Blamish myre shell (with level 15 Crafting) to make a myre snelm.

The Myre Blamish Snail is a very common snail which lives in the Mort Myre Swamp. This type of snail drops two items upon its death; a Blamish myre shell and a Thin snail. Their respawn time is around 30–40 seconds. A chisel can be used on the dropped Blamish myre shell (with level 15 Crafting) to make a myre snelm.

The '''Myre Blamish Snail''' is a very common snail which lives in the Mort Myre Swamp.
This type of snail drops two items upon its death; a Blamish myre shell and a Thin snail. Their respawn time is around 30–40 seconds. A chisel can be used on the dropped Blamish myre shell (with level 15 Crafting) to make a myre snelm.
